bought this game a long time ago but just recently picked it up again it truly is a delight playing trough the different chapters feels like watching a saturdaymorning cartoon great writing superb gameplay and even better animation big love for the team that made this

i had a lot of fun with this game easy to understand controls a nice variety of characters to collect and play as and a fun story i only wish the game was longer and the online was active the game is on sale now for 1000 which a great price to buy it i do feel buying while on sale is worth so definitely wait to buy then  story amusing enough 6510 game play solid 7510 online dead 010 ots fiar 610 fun factor enjoyable 810 overall definitely but on sale 710

didnt expect this game to be as fun as it is worth a play for sure
totally rad game i love sports rpgs
gem of a game really enjoyed my time with it go get it this wintersale
super fun and light hearted kid friendly in case any parents are wondering

its a great game  its like it a jrpg with the themevibe of pokemon but instead of turnbased combat its dodgeball matches  sounds great looks great charactersworld is fun and most importantly the gameplay is fun it did get a little repetitive and too easy at the end for me but that is partly my fault for grinding away at one side quest for too long so i was overlevelled  would strongly recommend i hope a sequel comes out so i can play the interschool tournament
it feels and sounds like a game boy rpg plays like a sportsaction game and reads like a manga its as good as it looks and its the prettiest i loved it

meio repetitivo pois no  la to facil fazer um jogo no repetitivo baseado em queimada mas em si um jogo muito bom historinhas legais sistema de itens bons gameplay fenomenal s acho que faltou um real jeito de mudar a dificuldade pois apenas mudar o dano que voc recebe ou da  meio ruim
for a simple little game its a fun change of pace and worth playing not the best game ever but im still glad i got it
solid game god job daddy is proud
a quirky realtime rpg that has a lot of paper mario in its dna
fun little action rpg i love the unique art style played a big on gamepass cloud and picked up here to mess around with a bit more fun game
super fun thank you for making this wonderful game

dodgeball academia is a flawed repetitive game that managed to make me smile throughout the entire 15 hours i spent with it for every thing you can criticize there are two more things that just feel magical with how full of love and character they are definitely recommend to anyone that sees the screenshots and thinks it looks cute
i love this game it has a great story and good enough gameplay

it overstayed its welcome a bit for me but all in all i had a great deal of fun the first 10 hours especially were a blast the second half of the game dragged on a bit because almost no new mechanics were introduced but the plot just went on and on i guess this is partly my completeionist ass fault as i had to literally do anything the game had to offer
a fun little rpg adventure the combat is pretty solid in that you play dodge ball in teams of up to 3 characters on your side of the court expect around 12 hrs to complete the story line
good one
excelent game my nephews love it

youll get 1015 hours out of the game its fun lots of references to pokemon controls can be awkward at times but theres enough diversity that the smaller fights dont feel incredibly tedious would recommend buying it on sale

ok but repetitive like its inspiration pokemon
i really enjoyed this game its cute and funny its rarely challenging just a game to relax

loved the story and gameplay got it in a humble bundle so it was extra cheap but id definitely pay 15 for it

a goofy little dodgeball rpg with fun animation and character design an enjoyable plot that takes itself not too seriously fun dialog with its own endearing sense of humor a soundtrack that goes surprisingly hard and gameplay and length 10h that doesnt overstay its welcome i enjoyed every hour i spent with it definitely worth a play

dodgeball academia is a silly game oh but i dont mean that in a bad way da is lighthearted funny charming and has a lot going on on its mechanics  the game jests about being a manga anime and in fact that is what if feels cheesiness included its a good game with good gameplay good dialogues great characters and a lot of charisma a good time indeed
juicy
super cute and very fun   this game oozes passion
fun gameplay boring cliche story  would still recommend tho if youre looking for a lighthearted gaming experience but it wasnt for me

this game is really fun and i think the game has a great difficulty level in addition to charming characters that leads to just having a good feeling game if you are looking for something that is challenging and fun this is your game
keeps things fresh has a nice look and a pretty decent story a solid rpg

i love this game im putting my thoughts together on a list of games ive come to love that more people should play and this is at the very top  if you like pokemon if you like quick sports games if you enjoy wonderful handdrawn aesthetics humorous dialogue skill check mania and are just into a fun game this is no1 for all of those things combined  its an incredible game and seeing only 250 reviews has me shocked play dodgeball academia

this game delivers upon everything that its premise and graphical style promises a mario rpg style game with old school kunio dodge ball combat its a celebration of mans desire to inflict minor injury upon man with spherical objects there are achievements for repeatedly hitting unsuspecting people in the face you already know what this is about and whether it appeals to you
great game fantastic artwork good gameplay superb value at current price i recommend it for indie games fans

fun unique little indie game that i thoroughly enjoyed and recommend for anyone combat is easy to learn with just the right amount of gameplay elements to keep you on your toes lots of accessibility options so you can fine tune the difficulty and a few other things replayable and even has a versus mode to keep you engaged after you beat the game look forward to more titles from this developer

dodgeball rpg yes brought me back to the days of dodgeball  super dodgeball granted there are certain battles that are very variable  rng at times the difficulty can be adjusted to make up for this  looking forward to a sequel or dlc
actually a really good game love the 2d art style gameplay is fun the unique skill of each character make the match always feel refresh and variety definitely recommend
i had a great time with this game light hearted and fun
engaging storyline excellent characters and dodgeball whats not to love
good
very good game reminding me of some old school mario tennis the game is actually not that easy but still manageable theres not a lot of sidequests though which is kinda sad
this game is very awesome
great gameplay but could get repetitive at times enemies do get harder as you progress through the game

i greatly enjoyed this game  large cast of characters that were for the most part well used all over plenty of challenging battles and mini games a great soundtrack and a fun well paced writing team behind it all giving a good solid push
a very cute dodgeball game rather fun and nice to pass time for would be nice if it comes out with arcade mode vs cpu
even though at the very end i decided to use the difficulty settings to make a few of the fights easier i still really enjoyed all the charming characters boppin soundtrack and the engaging gameplay
simple but very fun the comedy is great pacing overall is good the combat is very enjoyable overall a great experience

pretty damn good goofy game characters are fun and the plot is just interesting enough to keep me playing online would take this to the next level id love a sequel where we followup the interschool championship thing definitely worth 20

definitely one of the most unique indie rpgs out there plays super well and the world and characters are very charming i wish there was more depth in the story and writing but ultimately thats not really the games fault all around a great rpg and probably the best dodgeball game ever made

this game rules the animation is beautiful the story is funny and interesting the characters are cool everything about this is awesome but what i love the most is the feeling of getting better and better in this special dogeball game and beating the hell out of other students
